Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the Necropolis path, approaching the Walk of Heroes.
Room.LongDescription: The path becomes a bit overgrown, as if it hasn't been cared for in quite some time. The mausoleum is still visible to the north, but you shiver just looking at it. To the southeast, the Walk of Heroes comes into view, a place where the greatest heroes in Oceancrest's ancient history are buried, each with monuments in their name.
